Shipping calculated at checkout.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_wc_add_to_cart _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” fields_background_color=”#ffffff” fields_text_color=”#1C1C1C” fields_font=”|600||on|||||” fields_text_align=”center” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”16px” button_text_color=”#FAF7F2″ button_bg_color=”#ea9f8c” button_border_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” button_border_radius=”5px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” button_on_hover=”off” button_custom_margin=”||||false|false” button_custom_padding=”12px|45px|12px|35px|true|false” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|desktop” border_radii_fields=”on|0px|0px|0px|0px” border_width_all_fields=”1px” border_color_bottom_fields=”#4a4850″ global_module=”653″ saved_tabs=”all” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_bg_color__hover=”#ea9f8c” button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on”][/et_pb_wc_add_to_cart][et_pb_wc_meta show_tags=”off” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”||30px||false|false” global_module=”649″ saved_tabs=”all”][/et_pb_wc_meta][et_pb_accordion open_toggle_text_color=”#9A9E85″ closed_toggle_background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” icon_color=”#9A9E85″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” toggle_text_color=”#595959″ toggle_font=”||||||||” toggle_font_size=”18px” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” border_width_all=”0px” border_width_bottom=”5px” border_color_bottom=”#D2D8BC” locked=”off”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Greenery Details” open=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”]

Overview

  • A classic foliage, Italian Ruscus greenery adds a dainty, soft touch to sweet and serene arrangements.
  • Each stem features several laterals, covered in shapely green leaves, which are a bit shiny and waxy.
  • Ruscus is making them an ideal backdrop for arrangements, table garlands, or centerpieces. 
  • Ruscus holds up well without water, even in hot weather. Its long lasting natures means that you might be able to re-use it for another event after yours! 

Number of Stems

  • 10 stems per bunch
  • Stems are 60-80 cm long. 

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Greenery Care” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”-30px||||false|false” open=”off”]

For information about general greenery care and important notes about quality, check out our Care Guide

  • Give everything a fresh cut (about 1 inch off), at an angle, with your snips and put them in fresh water. With greenery you don’t have to worry about crowding the same way you do with flowers.
  • Remove any leaves that fall below the waterline of your containers, doing this will help prevent the growth of mold or bacteria which could cause premature wilting.

QUALITY

  • Your greenery will arrive looking thirsty and sleepy. This is absolutely NORMAL
  • Since flowers are a product of Mother Nature, the exact color tones and leaf shape of the greenery may vary to some degree.
  • IMPORTANT ** Not every stem will be perfect. I follow the 5% rule, meaning that out of 100 stems, 5 stems may break while unpacking, look a little too mushed, etc. Don’t let this stress you out! It’s totally normal and to be expected when dealing with fresh/live product.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Quality Help” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”-30px||||false|false” open=”off”]

Recipes are made to be tweaked, but here is a general rule of thumb for quantities of ruscus: 

  • Bridal Bouquet: 1/3 bunch
  • Bridesmaid Bouquet: 1/4 bunch
  • Boutineers: Sprigs
  • Corsages: Sprigs
  • Centerpieces: 1/4 bunch
  • Large Arrangements: 1-2 bunches

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Product Video” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”-30px||||false|false” open=”off”]

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” border_color_bottom=”#efede8″ global_module=”644″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_wc_related_products sale_badge_color=”#F185B7″ icon_hover_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” hover_overlay_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” product_title_font=”|600|||||||” product_title_text_color=”#4A4850″ product_title_font_size=”18px” price_font=”|600|||||||” border_radii_image=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” product_title_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” product_title_text_color__hover=”#dca295″][/et_pb_wc_related_products][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
